prepareScript:
sudo rm -f /etc/yum.repos.d/*.repo; sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/rhel9internal.repo <<EOT
[RHEL-9-NIGHTLY-BaseOS]
name=baseos
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-9/nightly/RHEL-9/latest-RHEL-9.7/compose/BaseOS/x86_64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0

[RHEL-9-NIGHTLY-AppStream]
name=appstream
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-9/nightly/RHEL-9/latest-RHEL-9.7/compose/AppStream/x86_64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0

[RHEL-9-NIGHTLY-CRB]
name=crb
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-9/nightly/RHEL-9/latest-RHEL-9.7/compose/CRB/x86_64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0
EOT
